ygData.messageBody:
This one time i was practicing my archery and i was chasing this wolf,
now a guard walked into the arrows path, and it said i attack Guard
Jascen. And he proceeded to smack the heck out of me until i finally
zoned.
Now i checked my target and it still said the wolf.

I have also noticed that when i cast fear on a creature and my pet is
chasing it, when i fire an arrow, i dont get the hit/miss message. Its
as if it was never reaching the target.

Now heres my question,
Do you need an unobstucted path for the arrow to hit?
And if an NPC does get in the way, does it count as an attack, even
though they arent targeted?

Im not complaining mind you. It actually makes sense. But i would like
to know if this is the way it works so i can plan a strategy
accordingly. Or was this just some weird fluke that could only happen
to me?

Thanks,
Bathory
Cazic-Thule
